text.section: In this part the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Applicant" means an entity that applies for a grant under this part.
"Distribution organization" means a nonprofit entity that distributes food or equipment to emergency food organizations.

section.section: "Emergency food organization" means a nonprofit entity that provides emergency food services.

"Emergency food organization" includes an organization that operates:
a soup kitchen; or
a food pantry.

text.section: "Program" means the Statewide Nutrition-Assistance Equipment Program.
